# MyersDiff&lt;T&gt;.GetSimilarity method

Returns a similary index between 0 and 1 inclusive. 0 means A and B are completely different. 1 means they are exactly alike. The similarity index is calculated as twice the length of the LCS divided by the sum of A and B's lengths.

```csharp
public double GetSimilarity()
```
